In England, in the seven days to 20 August, there were 185,277 new confirmed cases (327.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 13 August, there were 173,266 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 7% (12,011 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 25 August is 5,734,967 (10,141.4 cases per 100,000 population).
